Entries.Ann: @ Egg picking festival? See if the children will give So much interest$7
Entries.Ann_spouse: yay!! $1#$b#You're going to go find it.

Entries.Ann: Can't wait anymore #$b# I really like the food here #$b# @ You're looking forward to it ^ @ You're looking forward to it.$1
Entries.Ann_spouse: So what are you going to put in it? @? #$b# Don't put anything lazy. Let's go. I'm waiting for soup. of this year

Entries.Ann: I should have brought a camera ... $2
Entries.Ann_spouse: how!!! I can't wait to see the jellyfish migration $1#$b#yes, the green ones are so rare!!$1

Entries.Ann: Look at this, there are so many items for sale!! You're also a farmer. $0 #$e#Do you have anything for sale?$1
Entries.Ann_spouse: This kind of atmosphere is good, isn't it?? #$e#Okay, what do you need? Let me do something!!$1

Entries.Ann: The weather is getting colder...$2#$e#whether it's the weather or the atmosphere...
Entries.Ann_spouse: I think I feel Something grabbed my arm...$2

Entries.Ann: It's colder You also take care of yourself. I only have school uniform #$b#ha but I like cold weather because Thailand is so hot!!!$1
Entries.Ann_spouse: It's colder You also take care of yourself. #$b#but i like cold weather Because it's very hot in Thailand!!$1

Entries.Ann: In Thailand, there is a festival like this every year so I hope I get something..... $2
Entries.Ann_spouse: You brought me a present @?! $h#$b# This must be the best gift I've ever received...$l
